paragraph: Marko je student koji ___1___ (ići) na sveučilište svaki dan. Jučer je ___2___ (učiti) za ispit iz matematike tri sata. Obično ___3___ (ustajati) u sedam ujutro, ali sutra će ___4___ (ustati) ranije jer ima važan ispit. Kada ___5___ (završiti) fakultet, planira ___6___ (putovati) po Europi.

questions.explanation: Present tense, third person singular of 'ići' (to go).
Past tense, third person singular masculine of 'učiti' (to study).
Present tense, third person singular of 'ustajati' (to get up - imperfective).
Future tense construction with 'će' + infinitive 'ustati' (to get up - perfective).
Present tense, third person singular of 'završiti' (to finish/complete).
